EmailTemplate.name: Gahanna Open House 091411.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Learn How Gahanna Division of Police Utilizes TriTech Software Systems' Imc Solutions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join Us Gahanna Division of Police Open House
You are cordially invited to attend an open House and Software Demonstration on Wednesday, September 14th from 9:00 AM to 12:00 PM at the Gahanna Division of Police, 460 Rocky Fork Blvd., Gahanna, Ohio 43230.
All attendees will get an inside look at Gahanna Division of Police opeartions using TriTechs' Imc Solutions. Their vehicles will also be available to see the mobile solution.
Agenda: 9:00 AM - 9:15 AM Introductions and Breakfast
9:15 AM - 9:45 AM Company Overview, Value of Integration
9:45 AM - 10:15 AM Records Management, Property/Evidence and Crash
10:15 AM - 10:30 AM Break
10:30 AM - 11:00 AM Computer-Aided Dispatch
11:00 AM - 11:30 AM Mobile
11:30 AM - 12:00 PM Department Tour / Questions & Answers
To Register, please copy and paste the below URL into your internet browser: http://offers.tritech.com/GahannaOpenHouse091411_Registration.html
Where is Gahanna Division of Police?
http://maps.google.com/maps?hl=en&rls=com.microsoft:en-us:IE-SearchBox&rlz=1I7RNRN_en&q=Gahanna+Division+of+Police,+460+Rocky+Fork+Blvd.Gahanna,+OH+43230&bav=on.2,or.r_gc.r_pw.&biw=1073&bih=804&wrapid=tlif131412602161610&um=1&ie=UTF-8&sa=N&tab=wl
460 Rocky Fork Blvd. Gahanna, OH 43230
Questions? Contact Regional Sales Manager John Kitsmiller (512) 809-6763 john.kitsmiller@tritech.com
Share this message with colleagues or visit us at www.tritech.com This email was sent by TriTech Software Systems 9860 Mesa Rim Road l San Diego, CA 92121
